body:
Ikrima,

Glad to hear you are up and running!

I agree with Randolph, the RwR textbook is really important grounding in
the basics of Radiance. On the other hand, the newer tutorials written by
Andy McNeil and the Radiance cookbooks by Axel Jacobs (the latter of which
are still available, not to be confused with his original 3-phase
tutorial) will get you up and running on the BSDF stuff which it sounds
like you are anxious to get rolling with. They do assume some familiarity
with the basics, which may trip you up in the beginning, however.

Good luck!

- Rob
